original_text: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord for his sin which he hath sinned, a female from the flock, a lamb or a kid of the goats, for a sin offering; and the priest shall make an atonement for him concerning his sin.
korean_text: 그 잘못으로 말미암아 여호와께 속죄제를 드리되 양 떼의 암컷 어린 양이나 염소를 끌어다가 속죄제를 드릴 것이요 제사장은 그의 허물을 위하여 속죄할지니라

sentences.original_text: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 속건 제물을 여호와께 가져올 것이요

sentences.original_text: for his sin which he hath sinned
a lamb or a kid of the goats
and the priest shall make an atonement for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그를 위하여 속죄를 행할 것이며
